plan.alert_time: Thời gian phải báo trước 5 phút

title.title: Booking detail
title.text_wait_confirm: Please wait for staff to confirm the appointment, chat with staffs to know the route
title.text_upcoming: Please wait for staff in the process of moving, chat with staff to know the route

payment.text6: Escort HR Services and Professional Freelancer
payment.text1: Please transfer to one of the suppliers' banks below to convert to a
payment.text2: and use the service more convenient and economical than cash payment of 20%.
payment.text3: If you do not need to use the service, you can contact the call center for a refund according to the general regulations. (withdrawal fee 10%)
payment.text4: When you transfer into the above accounts, your money will be immediately converted to Tim so you can start using the Services.
payment.text5: If after 10 minutes you have not been redeemed, please contact the hotline: 1900 63.62.92. Enter your message Or send your statement via hotline zalo: 0919005856 to be activated or refunded.
payment.content: Content for transfer: Customers phone number 0986986xxx recharge

order_employee.not_enough_money: You need to have a minimum balance of 30% of the booking value!

payment_type.alert: Please pay cash to staff immediately after the appointment ends. Tell Me sincerely thank you!

card_info.alert_content: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment? You will be charged 30% of the total appointment fee when canceling this appointment. This policy helps you review carefully before canceling the service
